name: Cynthia Harper
text: Hello everyone. Wanted to post a little information on here as to our updated store hours. The Black Bear (Purple Cow) is now open Mon-Sat 6am-10pm and on Sunday we are open 8-8. I invite everyone to come in and give us another chance. I work the morning shift Mon-Sat and 10am-8pm on Sundays.

name: Mr Dave
text:
Their gas pumps do not participate in the Shell oil company discount program
Was surprised

name: Carla Kennedy
text: Wines on bottom shelf are labeled $8.99 however they ring up $13.99 or more. I ask cashier about this and he said he couldnt change the paper tag prices on the shelf. He said all his customers know prices are higher in computer. What? Watch your bill there next time.

name: Ellen Cook
text: On a recent pit stop, the bathrooms were FILTHY!  I figure with it being a fairly new store, I would stop there. I wood recommend the Shell.

name: Patrick McCaskill
text: Stay away.  I try and stay to the circle k's, just needed something quick. Not great service.....will leave it at that.

name: Raymond B
text: Why don't you guys give out paper receipts. I know you have a receipt printer because Ive seen people get an actual receipt. Thermal paper rolls are cheap as hell and I'd rather have a real receipt than giving a stranger my number and email address. How do I know you guys arent selling customer information for a quick buck?

name: Gina Holland
text: Nice employees but unfortunately their products are mostly expired and always hot and their prices are really high.

name: Shawn Doggette
text: These people are crooks!!!!! I would not advise  anyone to give them your business. If you got to go a mile or to out of the way I would!!!! Rude, liars, and will charger the hell out of you!!!!!!

name: J. Hernandez
text: The people are pretty cool and the place is clean. But the prices on the beverages are always wacked. I bought two cheldas that read $1.69 and was charged $2.39ea then was told the prices were wrong then the guy gives me back a dollar. I just have an issue with the one dude he's always trying to get over on me. This isn't the first time but it will be the last.

name: Erin Defelippo
text: Be careful at this place at Jeff and Dawes. I used my card at the pump without thinking about it normal hurry hurry day for me. I managed to only have my card deactivated because the charge was more than 450$ and was done at Wal-mart the very same day (I dont do walmart I have panic attacks in there so small places like windixie it is for me). So  I went in and tried to explain to the clerk what happened since THAT was the last place I had used the card (no money on it until today after Aug 11) until today when I went to Circle K, and let him know that he may want to check the pumps and make sure everything is good. Guy looked at me like a deer caught in headlights......"u first problem" - Okay, but still its a good idea to go check it (His words to me where "Im too lazy" not "U first problem"). Apparently after talking to several people, I AM NOT the first person to have a problem with their card being skimmed at the pumps. I wanted to so badly scream at the guy putting gas in his car and pulling out his debit card "DONT DO IT!" but I didn't....I simply got in my own car and left.  Please make sure you ******check your pumps!********

name: Tameka Towner
text: They say 24 hrs but is not open 24 hrs and they nvr answer they phone they stay having attitudes and all just horrible service

name: Michael Garner
text: Name changed to Black Bear.

name: VCap Cache
text: Held on to my card for whatever reason! don’t pay with debit !! THIEFS!! you guys should be sued

name: Everyday Gamer
text: The cashier was very rude and discriminating against me

name: Arthur “Fire” Ball
text: They need to disclose the actual hours, it sounds open 24 hours but they close every night before 10 and I'm not sure how early they open.

name: Ana Thema
text: Says 24 hrs but it's been closed at 5am the last few times I've tried to go there.

name: Kayla Martin
text: Everything in the store is expired if I could give 0 stars I would and also fix the a/c all the candy was melting when I was in there

name: Alfred Taylor
text: Yeah

name: Valerie Dale
text: If you want to get some reasonably priced fuel as you're heading back from your fun trip to Atmore Alabama, be sure to stop at speedy Express pay AKA first choice groceries. I hear they got some great chicken there. Only reason leaving four stars is because it looks like it just needs to be updated a little.

name: tiffany lewis
text: Nice selection of ice cream but its a bit high

name: Suhag Patel
text: Great staff tasty food lower gas price

name: Leiira Hancock
text: We love the yellow store

name: Quanda00 Pettway
text: The owner is very inconsiderate my car got hit in the parking lot he has cameras but want try to help me I will never shop there again
